price: спустивши на њих кишу - а страшне ли кише за оне који су били упозорени!
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fasāa maṭaru al-mundharīna
